dialogues.text: How about it? Are we all set now?
Hmm... I still feel like something's missing.
Thanks to Seele's reminder yesterday, I realized that not everyone prefers the same flavors as me.
And, I think it would be a bit dull if we only have beverages while we chat.
I could try some more special or nostalgic dishes. They might bring up new topics for our conversation.
What do you think, Seele?
Today, my only job is to help you sort out the living room, and the rest is all up to you.
True, you've been busy with decorations, so I'll handle the rest.
It seems like you're gonna prepare more and more dishes...
... Speaking of which, you guys can be quite picky eaters.
Huh, really? Bronya maintains a very balanced diet, and Kiana's meals are usually taken care of by Mei.
Humph, there is no denying it. Kiana can vouch for that.
I remember it clearly. You all used to run long distances and eat lots and lots of cakes back at the Salt Lake Base.
So you were talking about back then, huh? Haha, nothing escapes your notice.
You're so reliable!
Don't think you can get away with that!
Thanks to your reminder, I'll take this opportunity to make some healthy dishes and encourage everyone to eat well!
Humph, that sounds about right...
No time to waste, so let's get started!
Alright, alright... Wait, how did I agree to this?
